name: „The Construction“ / excerpt from "Shift Simmers Slips"
description: 1920 x 1080 / 36sec "Shift Simmers Slips" is a 3D Shortfilm and massively inspired by and freely adapted from Luigi Serafini's "Codex Seraphinianus“. my film represents a small fragmentary collage of some of his created worlds, lifeforms and activities.
